comments.comment: Uhhh.... Is it wrong if I give them an essay as a reply?

Had this one hate comment on a comment I did on a post about spiders and drugs.One guy came out of no where and asked and I quote, "do you have stupid?" I tried to ask him what he meant but he just repeated it. After the 3rd or 4rth time I gave up and just started giving him fun facts about ants.
I dont get comments 😢

Yeaa- I'll do the same, a person I follow said “i don't need to get peoples art " but I just put it there cause I can't draw the ship and she/he said to practice but i am practicing but I post someone else's drawing cause why not? posts.caption:
Siapa yang suka dengerin lagunya Nabila Taqiyyah?☝🏻

Penyanyi jebolan ajang pencarian bakat ini menulis lagu yang berjudul “Hanya Lolongan” dengan penuh makna🎤

Liriknya menggambarkan bahwa suara haters hanyalah seperti lolongan di malam hari—bising, tapi tak berdampak. 🌙✨ Ohanians setuju, kan?

#hanyalolongannabilataqiyyah #hanyalolongan #nabilataqiyyah #hatersgonnahate #musicreview #songreview #ohreview #hatecomment #hate #ohanaspace #greenlakecity #gadingserpong

comments.comment: Lirik lagunya deep banget, aransementnya sangat bagus. Pesannya sangat bagus. Semangat unt jiwa2 yg sdg relate.🔥
Bener bgt Min seperti itulah arti lagu Hanya Lolongan❤️
Masya Allah suka banget sama lagu nya bisa bikin motivasi 😍😍😍😍😍

Setuju banget min, lagu ini layak dijadikan sebagai reminder penyemangat untuk kita yg sedang ada di fase down 🥹, mendengar lagu ini membuatku bangkit untuk semangat kembali, lagu ini menurut ku jdi salah satu lagu mahal yang pernah aku dengar selama ini. dari segi lirik makna dan melodi dilagu sangat sempurna, bangga banget sama Nabila diusianya yg masih 18thn tapi sudah menciptakan karya lagu yg berjudul "Hanya Lolongan" ini semoga makin banyak yg tahu dan mendengarkan lagu ini karena maknanya sangat mendalam dan ada pesan didalam lagu ini untuk mengajak kita bangkit kembali jangan berlarut-dalam kesedihan. Semangat semuanya untuk yg saat ini berada di fase down ayo bangkit karena ingat kata Nabila masih ada masa depan yg harus diperjuangkan 🤍.
Unknown

posts.caption:
I'm posting this to combat makeup shaming.
Many people think it's okay to comment on how much makeup someone's wearing or how it looks or something of the sort. Okay, first of all, it's NOT UP TO YOU WHAT ANYONE DOES WITH THEIR FACE OR BODY. IT'S THEIR BODY/FACE, NOT YOURS. Comments like "You're wearing too much makeup" or "Your eye makeup looks crazy and weird", like YOU WILL NEVER HEAR THOSE WORDS. COME OUT OF MY MOUTH. It's not up to anyone else what decisions you make, and if they don't like it, then they can fuck off and tell someone who cares! It is not ANYONE ELSE'S BUSINESS WHAT YOU DO WITH YOUR BODY OR YOUR FACE. People have commented on how much makeup I wear or how weird my eyeshadow looks and I just take a deep breath and say "Did I ask for your opinion?". Because for real now, people think it's okay to judge others without even knowing the full story. Someone might be wearing makeup because they feel more beautiful in it. They also might just enjoy playing with it/putting it on. Or maybe they just don't give two fucks what other people think because we're over here doing what we like, and striving hard to become the people we are meant to become and people try to come and give us shit because 1.) they don't have anything better to do and 2.) they think putting down others makes them feel and look superior, when in reality, it's just pathetic. I've always been one to stand up for my beliefs, and my belief here is that hating on others tells a lot about a person. It showcases their own insecurities and a twisted idea thinking it's okay to put others down in attempts to lift themselves up. But people aren't gonna change, are they? #endmakeupshaming #makeup #makeupshaming
#makeupisexpression #makeupisart #art #makeupartist #haters #hatersgonnahate #hatersbelike #hatersmakemefamous #hate #hater #hatecomments #hatecomment #hatersfuckoff #hatersroast #haterswillhate #lovehaters #spread #love #spreadlove #makeupcommunity #makeupartistcommunity #powerofmakeup #sheunites

Familiar dengan kata-kata ini? Atau pernah mengalaminya sendiri?
.
Hate Comment/Hate Speech memberikan efek negatif terhadap kesehatan mental para korbannya. Yuk share apa pengalaman pribadi kalian mengenai hate comment/hate speech ini dan bagaimana kalian mengatasinya?
.
Tulis di kolom komentar ya.. 💙🌞
Mari hentikan hate comment/ hate speech mulai dari kita!
#mentalhealth #hatespeech #hatecomment #everysmilematters

comments.comment: Some said “Betis kau besar kali, kek kaki babi “😔😔

Punya temen deket berkedok support tp ngerendahin "kamu tu temenan jangan murah2 bgt semua di temenin, liat aku mahal, kenalan aku pejabat semua, kamu gaada kan!, jangan murah jihan!!, kalo di telp blg aja sibuk, ga usah di terima semua ajakan orang, blg aja sibuk, ngapain ikut komunitas itu, emg kamu di bayar, klo ga di bayar ga usah ikut2 itu" sampe sekarang sedih terngiang2 kok tega gitu ngomong gitu dpn org, blg nya support, mungkin sepele bagi sebagian org tp itu nyes bgt sih di aku😢

Pernah banget beberapa kali dapat hate speech seperti, "u won’t be a leader because u don't have the leadership mindset or born with those skills” saat saya meminta saran untuk bagaimana caranya mengasah leadership skill saya ke teman saya.

Kata2 yg keluar dari mulut teman saya itu membuat saya ragu akan diri saya. Semangat untuk belajar dan berusaha memperbaiki diri jadi pudar sementara. Akan tetapi, setelah memikirkan apa yg telah terlontar dari mulut tmn saya, saya merubah mindset saya untuk melihat hate speech itu sebagai kritik yang bs saya jadikan acuan untuk bertumbuh lebih baik lagi. Setelah itu, saya juga lebih aktif dalam memperluas jaringan dan pengalaman untuk membuktikan kalau saya bisa berubah jika saya punya tujuan yg pasti.

Karena menurut saya, fokus ke diri sendiri lebih penting daripada memikirkan hal2 yg bs membuat kita hancur. Self-love is the best love🤍✨.
“kok lo santai bgt sih ngerjain skripsinya mentang2 pake beasiswa” hate speech yg sampe skrg melekat dan gamau temenan lagiii
Unknown
